data.title: Richard and Linda Thompson interviews, articles and reviews from Rock's Backpages
data.meta_description: View Richard and Linda Thompson interviews, articles and reviews from Rock's Backpages: The ultimate library of rock music writing and journalism. Thousands of articles, interviews and reviews from the world's best music writers and critics, from the late 1950s to the present day. Read the best writing on rock music here.
data.text:
